name: Sabdroidex
body:
### Description
SABDroidEx is a frontend for sabnzbd+, Sickbeard and Couchpotato on Android.
It is used to monitor your servers and to interact with them in the most complete and intuitive way.

SabdroidEx uses this library : http://viewpagerindicator.com/
Market URL: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.sabdroidex

### General Functions
The servers can be contacted behind an Apache web server,
separate authentication and access through SSL available,
following Android 4.0+ UI Look & Feel.

### Sabnzbd+ Functions
See the list of downloads,
see the history,
the downloads can be separately paused or cancelled,
the refresh rate can be changed,
items can be removed from the History,
downloads can be added with a direct link to an nzb,
downloads can be added by opening an nzb file,
Sabnzbd+ server settings can be accessed and changed.

### SickBeard Functions
See the list of Shows,
see the seasons for each Show,
see the status for each Episode of a Season,
change the status for each Episode.

### CouchPotato Functions
See the list of Movies.
and much more to come ...

### Dowload
[SABDroidEx.apk](http://dl.bintray.com/sabdroidex/SabdroidEx/SABDroidEx.apk?direct)

### Authors and Contributors
Project creator and maintainer : Marc Boulanger (@hellhand),
Couchpotato base developer : Roy Kokkelkoren (rkokkelk),
Patch provider : Chris van Marle (@qistoph)

### Support or Contact
Having a problem with the application ? Create issues on the project web page http://github.com/hellhand/SabdroidEx/issues .
If you want to participate in the project contact me directly (@hellhand) and we can discuss this further.

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/hellhand/SabdroidEx.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/hellhand/SabdroidEx)
